extendedInfo.description: You are the manager of the Ocean Tower, a gigantic skyscraper in the middle of the ocean.Make it a great place to live in.â¢ Compete in the race for the best tower â build upwards and downwardsâ¢ Use limited space wisely for optimum efficiencyâ¢ Use renewable energy sources (such as water, wind, or sun) to provide powerâ¢ Attract tourists with underwater photo safarisIn short: Your job is to build the future.âââââ Media Quotes âââââ âExcellent sound design and fine graphicsâ (Bild.de)âeasy to get intoâ (Spiele.T-Online.de)ââ¦ suggested for all fans of Sim Towerâ (IGN.de)âa very special building simulationâ (Androidpit.com) âgreat building simulationâ (MobileXP.de)Criticism, praise, problems with Ocean Tower? Share it with us! getsatisfaction.com/flaregamesMore about flaregames:http://www.flaregames.com // http://facebook.com/flaregames // http://twitter.com/flaregames

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: I am really enjoying this game, it is quite awesome building your tower up and finding the most efficient way to do layouts
reviews.author: stephen Ardern

reviews.title: Alright game
reviews.comment: Nice graphics but needs improvement.  A way to get 100% efficiency like a shop that increases efficiency the closer you are to that level, easier way to get credits. I like it so far
reviews.author: Wayne Chor

reviews.title: Great Before Latest Update
reviews.comment: Loved it until the latest update. It was somewhat self-efficient, but now you have to constantly press buttons or spend too much actual money on credits. Finally removing it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t even deserve one star
reviews.comment: Update was crap. Take it back to how it was i check every two hours and I\'m always making 0 when i used to make something, when everything is good i make around 142k an hour... Wtf on verge of uninstalling if not fixed by Friday
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I was a huge fan of sim tower back in the day and I was amazed by this game. It has great artwork and game play is satisfactory, I hope I\'ll have fun for days.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worse.
reviews.comment: Now my tower stops generating cash in a few hours. Im making half or less what I was before. I dont have time to collect cash every three hours. I wont be bothered by this game anymore.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ahhhhhh!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: I once gave this game a great rating.  It was fun and simple, and I loved it because it wasn\'t real money hungry.  But since the most recent update my game keeps frezzing and is no longer worth the headach.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to be fun
reviews.comment: The garbage bots were fine, it only took a minute or so to clear the building. Now it\'s just tedious; money appear on the step almost as fast as you can collect it. Combine that with exponentially increasing floor costs and ridiculous construction times, there\'s no point in playing anymore. Note that this does *not* make me want to buy coins, it just makes me not want to play. Give me a $10 pay once option to bypass all the BS and it\'s likely an instant sale.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crash after sub tour
reviews.comment: Great game fun but you really need to fix that every time an add pops up after the submarine tour the game crashes (every time).  five stars if fixed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Could be better. Long wait between unlocks due to the cost of adding floors, but this is a time eater kind of game, and its very hard to tap the button for the droids to collect money. Other than that a fun game. Reminds me a lot of the oldie simtower.
reviews.author: Justin Bates

reviews.title: Not worth your time.
reviews.comment: This is one of those \'play for 1 minute, wait 1 hour\' type of games that only aim at you spending money on things that would negate the waiting.  And it\'s not even one of the better executed ones.  Do yourself a favor and skip this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: So far so good - seems to take a long time to get money etc ,but that might be because I haven\'t got a lot of it when it comes to games- or queues! Also I can\'t get on to Facebook from here - keeps saying page doesn\'t exist\342\200\246 help with that would be appreciated.
reviews.author: Vanessa Savage

reviews.title: Ads 1 right after another!
reviews.comment: Thought they fixed it. I was wrong! One or two, but one right after the other. To hard to play the game.
reviews.author: Gail Nielsen

reviews.title: Total waste of time
reviews.comment: Wish I could give -5 rating. Update ruined a promising game. In a ploy to try and get real dollars for credit scam. I\'m in-installing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really disappointing
reviews.comment: I liked the game well enough before the last upgrade. Now I am forced to spend 8 credits to have the plethora of bots to work a decent amount of time. And don\'t get me started on having to pay over 5 mil a floor. I want my 4 hours for 3 credits back.  I am going to wait a while and probably uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too needy, do not want
reviews.comment: Before the update would slowly build income over a day, now it needs constant attention or you need to pay for cleaning services.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Tony Welsh

reviews.comment: After 2 days of automatic trash pick up, it says \"You have made 16,843,651 while you were gone.\" But there is only 15k in my account...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t update
reviews.comment: I just updated. Why have me at 96 floors sitting there constantly cleaning up to collect money. Get rid of this and let me go thru each floor just the one time. Bad move for this update. I\'m uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This game now Sucks
reviews.comment: Im at level 87 and the update that was done ruined the game im not going to click on 87 floors to collect money uninstalling now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok but needs more
reviews.comment: More development needed. Signed in with facebook but never got my 5 credits. Also sub tours don\'t respond quick enough to touch and the timer runs out too quick. Other than these problems its a nice game.
reviews.author: Blade Daywalker
